mapper.sql: nb_id AS id, nb_name AS name, u_id AS userId, nbt_id AS notebookTypeId, nb_createtime AS createTime
mapper.update: update cn_notebook set nb_name=#{name} where nb_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select from cn_notebook nb join cn_notebook_type nbt on nb.nbt_id==nbt.t_id where u_id=#{id} and t_name !='normal'
